name: asciinema
description: Asciinema is a tool to record terminal sessions and share them as lightweight, text-based videos. Recordings can be hosted or embedded anywhere and viewed in a web player. Great for tutorials, demos or debugging.
features: Terminal Recording: Record terminal sessions as lightweight text-based videos. Share your workflow.
Web Player: Embed recordings anywhere with the web-based player. Easy sharing.
Copy-Paste: Viewers can copy text directly from recordings. Interactive playback.
Lightweight: Text-based format is tiny compared to video files. Efficient storage.
Self-Hosted: Host recordings on your own server or use their service. Flexible deployment.
Perfect for Tutorials: Ideal for demos, debugging sessions, and documentation. Show, don't tell.
